::Spears:;

She was pleasently suprized when Striker picked her up.  She smiled 
and put her arms around his neck.  She kissed his cheek and smiled.
She couldn't help but feel her spark race and pound as she looked 
into his optic wihle he hels her.  She liked the feeling of having 
his strong arms around her.  Much less holding her up.  She smiled 
and kissed him, feeling her spark jump as her lips met his. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker continues to lead Spears toward the valley which he had in 
mind. He 
> had found it while doing patrolls, back in the time when the Ark 
was still in 
> good condition, and the Alliance was on the Maximals' side. He 
glances at 
> Spears, walking beside him.
> 
> Suddenly an urge to pick her up over comes him (my chars have been 
having 
> lot's of urge's lately, havn't they?), Striker not resisiting it 
one bit as 
> he swoops Spears off her feet with a quick motion, picking her up 
and hoping 
> that she wouldn't resist.
